channel.title: 667 Drop Editor! FIXED VERSION!
channel.description:
Ok, I know shabba made a tut on this but it had errors so these are the better files. It also has the .bat file included. Yes this may encourage leechers! But tbf, I don't care about the leechers they can stuff off, but this may help peeps who are not leechers.
Download these file's here: http://www.upload.ee/files/2529082/NPC_Drop_Editor.bat.html = Npc Drop Editor bat file http://www.upload.ee/files/2529081/Drop.java.html = Drop.java http://www.upload.ee/files/2529080/dropEditor.java.html = dropEditor.java http://www.upload.ee/files/2529074/ItemDefinitions.java.html =itemDefinitions.java http://www.upload.ee/files/2529075/NPC.java.html = NPC.java http://www.upload.ee/files/2529076/NPCDrops.java.html = NPCDrops.java
File Locations on where to add these or edit the .java file's:
*Drop.java location = com/rs/game/npc *dropEditor.java = com/rs/tools *itemDefinitions.java = com/rs/cache/loaders *NPC.java = com/rs/game/npc *NPCDrops.java = com/rs/utils *NPC Drop Editor.bat = with the other .bats in server.
Simply just add all those files to the places specfied above and when done compile. After load up NPC Drop Editor.bat. If you get an error post it here. Remember to change the java path if you have a different java version.
If you get this error..
[code]starting... src\com\rs\tools\dropEditor.java:474: error: id has private access in NPCDefinit ions if (def.id == e.getKey()) { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
do this..... go to npcdefinitions.java and find:
[code]private int id; [/code]
and change it to
[code] public int id; [/code]
Hope it helps.

item.title: 667 Drop Editor! FIXED VERSION!
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“maccrash5, post:12, topic:450446”]when I run NPC_Drop_Editor.bat say:
starting…
Error: Could not find or load main class com.rs.tools.dropeditor
press any key to continue . . .

HELP![/quote]
You have to capitalize the e in editor because it is case-sensitive. Basically it’s looking for dropeditor class but you have dropEditor.

Nice release, but this is in the wrong section I believe.

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Drop Editor! FIXED VERSION!
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

[quote=“rentedo999, post:7, topic:450446”]Thanks for this but do you think you could help me with one little thing it keeps telling this on compile

starting…
src\com\rs\tools\dropEditor.java:474: error: id has private access in NPCDefinit
ions
if (def.id == e.getKey()) {
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

OK for that… go to npcdefinitions.java and find:

and change it to

public int id;

Hope it helps.

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Drop Editor! FIXED VERSION!
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

Ok, I know shabba made a tut on this but it had errors so these are the better files. It also has the .bat file included. Yes this may encourage leechers! But tbf, I don’t care about the leechers they can stuff off, but this may help peeps who are not leechers.

Download these file’s here:
http://www.upload.ee/files/2529082/NPC_Drop_Editor.bat.html = Npc Drop Editor bat file
http://www.upload.ee/files/2529081/Drop.java.html = Drop.java

http://www.upload.ee/files/2529075/NPC.java.html = NPC.java
http://www.upload.ee/files/2529076/NPCDrops.java.html = NPCDrops.java

File Locations on where to add these or edit the .java file’s:

*Drop.java location = com/rs/game/npc
*dropEditor.java = com/rs/tools
*itemDefinitions.java = com/rs/cache/loaders
*NPC.java = com/rs/game/npc
*NPCDrops.java = com/rs/utils
*NPC Drop Editor.bat = with the other .bats in server.

Simply just add all those files to the places specfied above and when done compile. After load up NPC Drop Editor.bat. If you get an error post it here. Remember to change the java path if you have a different java version.

If you get this error…

starting... src\com\rs\tools\dropEditor.java:474: error: id has private access in NPCDefinit ions if (def.id == e.getKey()) { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 errors Press any key to continue . . .

do this… go to npcdefinitions.java and find:

and change it to

public int id;

Hope it helps.
